= Wayland Inc. =
=== Building a better world! ===

Wayland Inc. is a Real Estate led by [[barnard.wiki|Barnard Wayland]]. They specialize in getting abandoned or formerly unused mansions and putting them back on the market. Barnard made his fortune this way.

== The Truth ==

Wayland specializes in finding people in vulnerable spots with an abandoned mansion or two. They then make a pityful offer for the mansion and, if it isn't accepted, they just steal it. They then sell the mansion for a pretty penny, and become RICH.
